task.title: Fixed Dialling Number Settings Tutorial
task.shortdesc: This tutorial describes how to get and set the Fixed Dialling Number (FDN) settings.

context.p: The Fixed Dialling Number service restricts the user to dial only those numbers that appear in the FDN phonebook on the SIM or R-UIM.

step.cmd: Activate or deactivate FDN using RMobilePhone::SetFdnSetting()
Get the current FDN status using RMobilePhone::GetFdnStatus().
step.info: Possible status values types are described in the RMobilePhone::TMobilePhoneFdnStatus enum.
To receive the notification of any changes to the FDN status, use RMobilePhone::NotifyFdnStatusChange()

example.title: FDN settings example
example.p: The following code gets the FDN status, and checks if FDN is active.
The code assumes iMobilePhone is an RMobilePhone object.

postreq.p: You can find what the fixed numbers are through RMobilePhoneBookStore using the KETelIccFdnPhoneBook phonebook.
